Interface IProjectService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectService
public interface IProjectService

  • Method Summary

    Method

  • Method Details

    • loadProjects

      List<Project> loadProjects(Map<String,User> users)
      Loads project data from persistent storage (e.g., CSV file). Requires user data for validation (e.g., checking manager NRIC). Populates the service's internal project list.
      Parameters:
      users - A map of NRIC to User objects, used for validation.
      Returns:
      A list of loaded Project objects.

    • saveProjects

      void saveProjects(List<Project> projects)
      Saves the provided list of projects to persistent storage. Overwrites the existing project data file.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of Project objects to be saved.

    • findProjectByName

      Project findProjectByName(String name)
      Finds a project by its unique name (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project to find.
      Returns:
      The Project object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves a list containing all projects currently managed by the service. Implementations should consider returning a copy.
      Returns:
      A list of all Project objects.

    • getProjectsManagedBy

      List<Project> getProjectsManagedBy(String managerNric)
      Retrieves a list of projects managed by a specific HDB Manager.
      Parameters:
      managerNric - The NRIC of the manager.
      Returns:
      A list of projects managed by the specified manager. Returns an empty list if NRIC is null or no projects are found.

    • addProject

      void addProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project to the service's internal list. Should perform checks to prevent adding duplicates (based on project name).
      Parameters:
      project - The Project object to add.

    • removeProject

      boolean removeProject(Project project)
      Removes a project
      Parameters:
      project - The Project object to remove.
